dcterms:description: The ISLES 2017 dataset includes 75 ischemic stroke patients, each with a 4D dynamic susceptibility contrast MR perfusion image, used for evaluating ischemic stroke lesion segmentation.
dcterms:title: ISLES 2017 dataset

dcterms:creator: Peirong Liu
Yueh Z. Lee
Stephen R. Aylward
Marc Niethammer
dcterms:description: The PIANO dataset is used for perfusion imaging via advection-diffusion, focusing on estimating underlying physics in transport dynamics.
dcterms:title: PIANO dataset

dcterms:description: The IXI brain dataset is a collection of brain MRI images used for various medical imaging analyses, including stroke lesion segmentation.
